result.markdown:
## Estimating Cost of Debt from YTM ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(505) #| eval: true #| results: asis #| echo: false #| warning: false library(webexercises) coupon <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.05, sd = 0.005) ytm <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.055, sd = 0.005) tc <- 0.34 ``` ::: Aurora Technologies has outstanding bonds with coupon rate **4.44**% and yield-to-maturity (YTM) **4.86**%. The corporate tax rate is **34**%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ After-tax cost of debt = YTM × (1 − T_c) = **3.21**%.
:::
